title: Mark Cavendish Survives Day of Tour de France Torment: ‘I was Seeing Stars’
content:
Record-chasing sprinter is 'not sick'; endures vomiting and seven vile Italian climbs to live to fight another day.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Survives Day of Tour de France Torment: ‘I was Seeing Stars’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
